data.title: Alice Walton
data.meta_description: #21 Alice Walton on the 2024 Billionaires - Alice Walton is the only daughter of Walmart founder Sam Walton. She has focused on curating art, rather than
data.text:
Alice In Chains Earns Their Second-Biggest Career Hit On One Chart

Alice In Chains' "Nutshell" debuts on Billboard's Hard Rock Digital Song Sales chart, earning the band their third career top 10 smash.

Women’s Gymnastics 2024 Olympic Beam Final Results: Italy’s Alice D’Amato Wins Gold In ‘Splatfest’

Discover how Italy’s Alice D’Amato won gold in the 2024 Olympic beam final, amidst a dramatic competition filled with unexpected falls.

Alice In Chains’ Early Smash Gives The Band Their First Hit On A Billboard Chart

Alice In Chains' “Man in the Box” debuts on Billboard's Hard Rock Streaming Songs chart this frame, giving the band their first hit on the ranking.

Emmy Nominations: ‘Fallout’ And The Ghoul Actor Walton Goggins Nab Nods

“Fallout” and Walton Goggins—who stars as The Ghoul—are heading to the 76th Annual Emmy Awards. Click in for more details.

COUNCIL POST | Membership (fee-based)

Features And Benefits Of AI Tools For Digital Advertising

AI technology is changing the way businesses target customers, personalize ads and optimize campaigns for the best possible outcomes.

Billionaires Bailing On Biden: Barry Diller, Christy Walton, Reed Hastings Urge Biden To Drop Out

Billionaire Mark Cuban said Democrats should consider a replacement for President Joe Biden after his poor debate performance—but megadonor Reid Hoffman called pushing Biden to drop out a “bad idea.”

More Billionaires Urge Biden To Drop Out: Walmart’s Christy Walton, Crypto Titan Novogratz

The 10th-richest American woman, whose son donated hundreds of thousands toward Biden’s 2020 election bid, called on Biden to “pass the torch of leadership to the next generation of Democratic leaders.”

32 Years After His Death, We’re Still Learning So Much From Sam Walton

His key philosophies and obsession with continuous learning and customer-centricity can continue to guide businesses today.

Tom Bower Dead: ‘The Waltons’ And ‘Die-Hard 2’ Actor Was 86

Tom Bower, who appeared on "The Waltons" and in "Die Hard 2, has died. He was 86.

Google Sends Artists Down AI Rabbit Hole To Reimagine ‘Alice In Wonderland’

Google Labs asked artists to create their own versions of original "Alice in Wonderland" illustrations using AI. You've never seen Lewis Carroll's classic quite like this.

Nobel Laureate Alice Munro Sold 1.2 Million Books In Last 20 Years—Here Are Her Bestsellers

The "master of the contemporary short story," Nobel Prize winner Alice Munro, died Monday.

Lukas Walton’s Climate-Focused Investment Firm S2G Raises $600 Million In Outside Funding

The move by the Walmart heir represents the first time that he’s opened the firm up to outside investors.

EEOC And Investors Support Hello Alice’s Grants For Black Entrepreneurs

Despite a lawsuit challenging grants for black-owned businesses, Hello Alice closed a Series C funding round and continues to give grants to small businesses.

Alice In Chains Doubles Their Total Number Of No. 1s On A Billboard Chart

Alice In Chains' classic EP Jar of Flies makes a triumphant return, debuting at No. 1 on Billboard's Vinyl Albums chart and marking the band's second chart-topper.

‘Fallout’: Walton Goggins On Whether Series Is Faithful To The Video Game

“Fallout” star Walton Goggins talks about whether he thinks the show's adaptation of the video game series will meet fan expectations and reveals the motivations of his character The Ghoul.
